website_summaries.verdict: Good price for an album that features a bonded leather cover with a great look.
pros: Good capacity in this sharp-looking photo album, as it can hold up to 300 photos measuring 4 x 6 inches
Each page contains space for writing next to the photograph, or you can add some scrapbook artwork
All pages are free of chemicals that could harm your prints
cons: Pages cannot be removed as they are stitched into the album

customer_reviews.title: Pockets aren't really pockets at all
customer_reviews.text: I wish the description would've made it clear that the "optically clear pockets" are just one huge pocket per page instead of 3 picture-sized pockets per page. You will have to use some kind of adhesive or other method if you want your pictures to stay in place, which is a MAJOR detraction if you ask me.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Bohn

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these a few years ago and just bought a few more. Great quality, they look nice and hold a ton of pictures. I plan on ordering more in the future!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ssk

customer_reviews.title: Binding has separated
customer_reviews.text: Nice to put photos is vertically or horizontally but the binding on one of the two books has already separated and I've literally only opened it 3 times. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: HMK

customer_reviews.title: I have photo albums from the 80s that have never ...
customer_reviews.text: I have photo albums from the 80s that have never split, ripped, or otherwise torn, however the photo albums from today, these included, I can't even get the pictures in without ripping the layer of plastic that is supposed to secure and protect my pictures.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: When I received them I was pleased with the looks
customer_reviews.text: I bought these albums to somewhat match the ones I've been buying at Costco since Costco is no longer carrying them. When I received them I was pleased with the looks, size and color. The quality seemed OK. After I lovingly inserted around 250 pictures, I went back to the front page and the pages completely split away from the binding. Thankfully this happened before I had written all my notes in the margins. Hopefully this is an isolated case as I didn't see any other reviews with this problem but I will return them for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn R.

customer_reviews.title: Ignore bad reviews
customer_reviews.text: So I seen a review that says it's just one giant pocket on each page.. the dividers just dont go all the way across allowing you to put the picture horizontal OR vertical. . .I've had no problem with my pictures sliding down or anything like that. I absolutely love this album and have area to write beside the picture which I like. I dont have to take the picture out to look at the back ya know? I would definitely without a doubt recommend this to anyone. Its durable. Not cheaply made at all in my opinion and i will be purchasing another soon
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Look for a different product.
customer_reviews.text: Should have paid attention to the negative reviews. I give this one star because the album cover looks nice however it smells terrible. One reviewer compared it to a sharpie marker. I think it's the glue on the binding. No amount of airing will get rid of that. The pages are flimsy and the cellophane like inserts are wavy. Bought three and they're on the way back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great Album - No Smell
customer_reviews.text: Found this on amazon - had great reviews and some that mentioned a horrible smell. I purchased it anyways and LOVE IT! The album did has a "scent" to it almost like if you ever bought a leather couch. The first day or so yes it smells brand new like the leather has just been cleaned or opened up to the air but it was nothing out of the ordinary. After a few days the smell was gone and now it's just an album that I love! Can't wait to fill this with photos and buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Alan F

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Received my photo album and started putting pictures in it. I was almost halfway done when I realized I forgot a few pictures from the beginning. So I took everything out, put everything back in to where I left off then realized I had skipped a page. So I moved the pictures and then started where I left off. Bottom line. With all of that movement you would think something would have happened to the plastic or a page. But the durability is amazing! And pictures don’t move around-however you put it in there is literally how it will stay.
customer_reviews.author: Smoore

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Albums, Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the brown leather albums to use as family albums. They are absolutely beautiful, and surpassed my expectations. The photos slide easily in, and the album holds its shape well! I would highly recommend these albums.
customer_reviews.author: CR Long Beach

customer_reviews.title: Stylish way to keep photos.
customer_reviews.text: I always buy these photo albums. I dont find any in the stores that I like better. They are well made and look nice all together on my shelf. The only minor problem is that you must be careful when sliding the photos in because you can tear the plastic covering. But, once you get the hang of it, it isnt a problem anymore. I would definitely recommend this photo album.
customer_reviews.author: JMF

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre at best photo album.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty awful. Plastic sheets rip just by turning the page! The page backing does NOT hold smaller pics in place. "European Leather" LOL!!! Its made in China out of God knows what? The plastic cover over the "leather" tells me they know the "leather" will not last. Only bought this album as albums are so hard to nowadays. Its a poor replacement for my old 1970s album this was bought to replace. I hate to admit it but l'm probably going to have to transfer the photos again to another album sooner than later :(
customer_reviews.author: WOWBUYS!

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful and useful photo album. Very high quality. Unbelievable price.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect album for 4x6 prints. They can fit in it straight or sideways. It holds a LOT of photos. It looks like a much more expensive item. You can buy a brass plate to label it with. The plate is of high quality, and at a very low price point.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Sander

customer_reviews.title: Best photo album ever!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot express how wonderful and nice these albums are! I was having a hard time finding a nice bike directional album that holds a lot of pictures, and that includes a space to write memos! This does all that, while being very sleek! Made with leather, each page contains 3 slots (front and back) for horizontal pictures and you can fit 2 4x6 pictures vertically on one page. I am so glad I found this item! I ordered two and will have enough space to put all my pictures from our recent trip to Maine! It is so nice to have an actual physical album to look back on!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Too tall...
customer_reviews.text: Too tall to fit in a normal sized bookcase. It is 14" tall and a standard book case is 12". My fault for not reading the details. I thought this might be similar to those sold at COSTCO,..but, they are not even close.
customer_reviews.author: P.E. McCormack

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews before I bought and was kind of skeptic on how this would come out. Got it in the mail today and at first didn’t smell the sharpie/plastic smell but then the second layer of the package was taken off and you can definitely smell it. It’s not as intense as people are describing though, I don’t really mind it. I can see how the middle part of the boo could come apart if you’re rough with it but I just plan on putting it on a shelf so no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Strong chemical odor, Flimsy pages
customer_reviews.text: The album has a very strong chemical odor, apparently coming from the inner pages or the binding. This odor did seem to become less noticeable over time--after I aired it out--but it is not the sort of thing you'd want to do in a small apartment. Its covers are gorgeous and appear to be sturdy but the interior pages are a bit flimsy--particularly the attachment of the plastic to the paper. Would like to see an improved version of this product on the market, as it has a lot of potential.
customer_reviews.author: D J

customer_reviews.title: A Modern Classic
customer_reviews.text: These albums (I bought two) were perfect for organising a collection of 10 outdated and different sized 40 year old family albums. With 600 photo sleeves (2x300) the pictures are now sorted in chronological order, with an area to write their descriptions, and protected from wear and aging. The sleeves allow you to remove or rearrange the pictures at any time. The binding looks very much like real leather and is an attractive addition to a bookcase or coffee table.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Bath

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Love this album more in comparison to other pioneer albums I’ve purchased in the past. I like the sewn in tabs as opposed to the three ring photo albums which I’ve easily broken due to the amount of pics the album was not able to hold. This album holds all the pics without a problem. Look forward to buying more maybe in other colors next time.
customer_reviews.author: Gia

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PHOTO ALBUM
customer_reviews.text: This is a great photo album!!! I read the reviews before I bought it and I haven't had any problems with the pictures falling out or not staying in the slots. The slots are not bound all the way through but I think it's so you can put some "longer" pictures in the book too
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use for 4x6 photos, but it's taking a long time for strong odor to lessen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Rippled Plastic Cover Phot Book
customer_reviews.text: This is a relatively cheap out album that holds up to 300 of the 4x6 pictures. It is easy to slide pictures into the pockets and looks good. However, Theron the outside of the cook the plastic is ripples up and looks terrible! I ordered 2 of these but will not order anymore after this one! It also has a strong plastic odor!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Burton

customer_reviews.title: Did not expect my second order to lack the quality of the first
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set of books, exactly the same. I am disappointed in the quality of these. The top of the sleeve and bottom are VERY fragile, and come away from the paper when you slide in the photos. I am using the photo size the fits the book or are a little smaller. Would not and will not purchase again
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite photo albums! We probably have about 10 now as I just order more when I print out photos. My children love being able to go through the albums and "see" our memories. It's so nice to not just have them on a phone or computer. There is an option to order little plaques that stick on to the outside of the album- we do this and have had great service. I just get the year monogrammed so we can keep the albums in chronological order. The albums also hold pictures that are either vertical OR horizontal which is very handy!
customer_reviews.author: NewMama

customer_reviews.title: Brings pictures to life again.
customer_reviews.text: Picture albums seem to be a thing of the past. But I have taken some trips that hold so many amazing memories that I decided to print out pictures. My grandchildren love looking at the pictures. So do I. It brings the trip back to life. These albums are great. They protect my treasured memories and give me a place to write notes telling about the picture.
customer_reviews.author: MG6

customer_reviews.title: Big but great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality and very large. I didn’t look at the size of it, so I was expecting it to be a little smaller. However it’s extremely good quality and holds a lot of pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn

customer_reviews.title: Weak Front Binding
customer_reviews.text: I really like this photo album because it was inexpensive, but I will say that I am very upset that the binding from the front of the book came undone within 10 mins of opening. It didn’t really effect the book majorly it just doesn’t look good.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy Lou Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Service Recovery
customer_reviews.text: First order arrived in packaging undamaged but the product itself was defective. Spine was separated pages. Quick return and the company made good. Ordered again and the second unit arrived and looks to be very sturdy and of high quality. Only time will tell but the company earns a 4 star for making it right.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Nice Photo Album
customer_reviews.text: I'm in the process of filling it with 4 x 6 photos, the max size it'll take in the pockets. I still have the protective plastic cover over the bonded leather exterior. It still emits a plastic-like smell after about 2 weeks, though; I'm not sure if it's the bonded leather or the plastic covered pages. No problems or issues otherwise except for being close to running out of room, so I'll need to order another!
customer_reviews.author: Rico Suave

customer_reviews.title: The clear sleeves don't adhere around 3 sides
customer_reviews.text: You expect the sleeves to be adhered on at least 3 sides...but they are only half way adhered on 3 sides...like you can flip the clear sleeve up...so it makes you wonder if a picture will be held in place or if it will fall out. Everything else is as described...and it is a good strong and durable...I will add more later after we try a picture out in it.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer bonded photo albums
customer_reviews.text: I love that the pages in the album are bonded, not in a ring holder. The albums are beautiful. The only drawback is the pages aren't strong enough for younger children to flip through, they tear. Otherwise, perfect. I intend to purchase more, I love the borders to write dates or events about each photo!
customer_reviews.author: Brunella

customer_reviews.title: Terrible odor
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry to say that I have to add my voice to the chorus. There is an absolutely horrible acetone odor coming from the internal linings of the covers. I will return my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Classicalmusiclover

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Look very nice and would go nicely on any bookshelf. A little hard to get pictures into, but for the price its fine. Very heavy but I wanted something that was sturdy and looks high quality. Recommend. I bought as a gift for my brother and filled with pictures for him. He was very happy with the books.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna B

customer_reviews.title: P-U!
customer_reviews.text: These hold a lot of photos and the album lays flat but the album smells absolutely TOXIC. Smells like your inhaling poisonous fumes. Hope the smell dies away before I do.
customer_reviews.author: Dania Wittmann

customer_reviews.title: I thought it was overpriced at first
customer_reviews.text: I was browsing photo albums and sought something for our USCIS interview that would aid with nice presentation of our whole relationship. While this was a tad pricier than some other options, I'm beyond impressed with the durable leather finish, the spine, the ease of sliding pictures in and out, and the little memo field included for every single pocket. I feel like I definitely stuffed more than 300 photos in here, too. The only gripe I have is that there's no external customization of the album - nowhere to label or indicate what's inside. That said, that's not a labeled feature on the product listing, so I shouldn't have expected that and therefore can dock no stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie P

customer_reviews.title: Buy these albums, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.text: I use a printing app, and these albums come in handy! Very sturdy, and chic looking. They remind me of those old Encyclopedias. I have 6 so far, but plan on ordering more to have the matching set
customer_reviews.author: Rachel R.

customer_reviews.title: The fumes will make you sick.
customer_reviews.text: Omg the smell. I'm actually feeling sick from the fumes off this thing. The pockets are really shallow, only about half a photo is Heald in place. Omg the fumes I think I'm going to be sick. Open a window when you use this album.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: All landscape, no portrait
customer_reviews.text: Depsite that all of the picture sleeves are for landscape, not portrait, this is nice. It wasn't too expensive and there is a place to write on next to each picture. I got two and I still have a zillion more pics to put away so it looks like I'll be getting a few more.
customer_reviews.author: EHM

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in quality
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered Old Town leather albums in past, but they are listed as no longer available. So I ordered this one. Not near the quality. The outside looks good, but the inside is very cheaply made and tears easily. Also, the place to write notes next to pictures is very slick and ink dries slowly, lots of smears if you don't watch out. Also, there is a VERY STRONG odor which I'm hoping goes away soon.
customer_reviews.author: ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer  Bonded Leather Allbum
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good album, but seems to be a bit on the cheap side, especially the inside pages. Pretty flimsy. Not sure I would purchase again. It seems to be the dominant brand out there though.
customer_reviews.author: C. Paden

customer_reviews.title: Check for quality
customer_reviews.text: When I first saw these I was excited. I ordered two in the same transaction. The first album was is in perfect shape. The second one I ordered had bad streaks on every single page and the book is bent up. Make sure you check these if you want to give them as a gift. The pages are really weak when you place the photos in, so make sure to be very careful.
customer_reviews.author: C.Y

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality photo albums!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to archive and organize an unbelievable amount of photos. I ordered several sets of these and my collection is streamlined now. The only thing I’d warn of is they are tall so won’t fit standing up on a normal bookshelf. Awesome quality photo albums!!
customer_reviews.author: Freya Free Spirit

customer_reviews.title: Great space for comments
customer_reviews.text: I like the leather covers but most of all I love being able to write the date and a note by each picture. It will be great years from now when my kids look back at their childhood and don’t have to pull out and look at the back of each photo for info they may have forgotten. It is all easily chronicled for them.
customer_reviews.author: twinsmom

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: Sleek, elegant design. I love that there are spots inside to write a short description next to the picture. My only complaint is the plastic sleeves can easily peel away if you aren't gentle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great photo albums
customer_reviews.text: These are great photo albums. And believe me, even millennials like looking at printed photos. Plus, these look great on a bookshelf
customer_reviews.author: WeHoLancer

customer_reviews.title: Misleading - can only fit very small photos
customer_reviews.text: The advertising is misleading and makes it look like you can fit large photos, but you can't. The pockets are so small that you can only fit very small photos. If you try to fit a normal photo, you have to tear the plastic sheet from the paper, and then the glue that held them together will stick to your photos instead, damaging your photos. Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a photo album with nothing on the front and no picture slot on the front and this turned out perfectly. It is very sturdy and holds a ton of photos with the option to write little notes next to the photos. I will definitely order another one.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we wanted! Was worried about the smell I had read about in the other reviews, but no smell must have fixed the issue! After I ordered one album and checked it out I was so pleased I ordered 10 more. Great service fast delivery and just what we wanted
customer_reviews.author: teri bishop

customer_reviews.title: Pages are not the best for pictures
customer_reviews.text: The leather binding is good, but the poor quality pages make their an $8.00 photo album. A disappointing purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Idaho resident

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: This photo album is a exactly as advertised. When I first opened the package there was a odd smell to the photo album which I assume was from the dye in the leather, but that soon dissipated. The look is absolutely perfect for a bookshelf or sitting on a coffee table. I would recommenced this as a gift, or for storing your favorite photos!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wow
customer_reviews.text: Built well, put together well. I had my artist brother in law draw my the book from hocus pocus and put it in behind the plastic. It looks just like it. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: LrG

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Immediately returned. Clearly cheaply constructed, looked like binding was already separating, and has trademark very conspicuously printed along the bottom of every page. Just weird.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: The leather is beautiful on these books and they look lovely on the ...
customer_reviews.text: The leather is beautiful on these books and they look lovely on the shelf. They could improve the design by having some way to mark the spine to show the contents. In addition the inserts are all designed to hold 4X6 pictures and it might be nice to be able to accommodate a variety of sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What IS that SMELL ???
customer_reviews.text: Been airing out these albums since I got them. The smell just won't go away. Very chemically odor. I can't accept this, it gives me a headache. Too bad, I even have 1 loaded thinking them smell would dissipate. It does not!
customer_reviews.author: DebJean25

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was needing!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to give these a shot since target quit carrying the ones I normally buy. They are a bit bigger and a little different on the inside but we’re exactly what was described. They work for what I need them for and they are high quality. Might even be better than the ones from target!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Just what I looked for
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a photo book to replace an older 3-ring photo book that was falling apart. This album looks nice and provides just enough space for the photos I needed to store. I'd buy another one in the future, if available.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Espy

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use as my wedding album because I could not make my own at the time. I did decorate it and I love the antique look of it. The old looking binding is amazing. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: ChristineML

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality album. Larger than I expected, fits 3 4"c6" pictures horizontally or two vertically with some extra space. Has a place for notes in the margin by each picture. Did have a chemical smell when first opened but aired out quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer Photo Albums are Quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality photo album. Love the color. Have many photo albums made by Pioneer that I purchased 10+ years ago. Same quality now as back then.
customer_reviews.author: TrueBlue4ever

customer_reviews.title: Great Album, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use pockets for 4X6 and also 5X7 - but it's really meant for the 4X6 photos, with plenty of space for writing names, dates and locations.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Fenton

customer_reviews.title: My friend liked her gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for someone. I just like that it was leather and bigger than the ones sold at the craft stores around here. Plus, it cost less on Amazon than at the craft stores.
customer_reviews.author: LeCats06

customer_reviews.title: Photo album
customer_reviews.text: I'm using for pictures of my husband, his great adventures In his life, to use at his Eulogy after this crazy virus ends. Great size .
customer_reviews.author: donna sherrill

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Literally gorgeous - love everything about this photo album but it is cheaper at b&h photo online so that’s where I’ll purchase from Now on.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect. When looking to buy photo albums all I could find were small scrap books where you basically have to put the entire thing together from scratch. I also take lots of pictures when I travel so I needed something with a lot of pages in it. (The scrap books only came with about 10 pages). The leather is good, durable quality. The pictures slide in easy and stay in place. And it has lots of pages so it can hold all my pictures. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S

customer_reviews.title: Photosave
customer_reviews.text: I been looking for everywhere in store for this kind of Album. Finally found on amazon and sturdi warmth and hittable product
customer_reviews.author: Hary

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad book but it’s not very sturdy. The photos move all around when turning the pages so you have to keep shoving them back in 😞I might have to take them all.
customer_reviews.author: HLS

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to find these as it matches the albums I already had. Hold a lot & sturdy. Leather material & easy to wipe off.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have two other similar Pioneer albums. This one is exceptional in quality and not much more in cost. Arrived as promised in just 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Peg

customer_reviews.title: Great albums
customer_reviews.text: These albums were purchased as a gift for my daughter who is organizing pictures taken over the years. She is pleased with the quality and look of them. Also likes the spaces to write notes for each picture. It's also nice that you can put in different size pictures. She plans to put the albums out to be looked through and enjoyed by family and friends. They are sturdy and should hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Garczynski

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: This product is CHEAP! BEWARE I own the same brand one but "Made In Philippines" and it is WAY better quality. This one is "Made In China" and is cheap. Binding will come apart right away and pages will be creased. The plastic photo slots will tear as soon as you start loading photos in. RETURNED.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Star Noah

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice photo album and is good quality. Looks great on the bookshelf and holds a decent amount of pictures.
customer_reviews.author: nick h

customer_reviews.title: These are not made sturdy enough to hold 300 pictures as advertised
customer_reviews.text: After placing 200 pictures in the album the paper binding holding the spine tore. These are not made sturdy enough to hold 300 pictures as advertised. Do you have a better made album? I don't feel like taking out 200 pictures to return it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Mello

customer_reviews.title: Good but Bad.
customer_reviews.text: They look great and are great for pictures but when I did my search they popped up under "3-ring leather folders" so I bought them because I was going to take the picture holders out and put in the clear full page holders I ordered and needed but the pages in these are STICHED IN. -.-, so they are very useless to me as I do not print small pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Borden

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Great photo album. My only complaint is when you want to place photos in vertically. They tend to slide out too easily. Not a big deal though.
customer_reviews.author: Blackety

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great album. Has a weird sorta smell when it arrived but with some airing out seems fine now.
customer_reviews.author: Kassie

customer_reviews.title: Great photo album for what you need.
customer_reviews.text: My fiancee and I bought this for her family. I was definitely pleased with the quality and would recommend this product to someone looking for a nice leather photo book! It serves the purpose you're looking for, but the pages are a bit thin so one of the pages ripped when we were trying to write notes on the side. But all in all it was good and would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: great quality. Hold lots of photos and keeps them ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, great quality. Hold lots of photos and keeps them in place, no sliding around and no glue or tape needed.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Love Photo Album
customer_reviews.text: Really very nice album both inside and out. High quality and easy to use. I purchased 2 more after seeing the first 2 I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann B. Belcher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Coffee Table or Office Space
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful album - the leather is exquisite. I like the fact that included with it is an option for creating a brass plate.
customer_reviews.author: V. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: GREAT album! Defintely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality photo album, especially for the price! The cover and binder feels like leather and looks expensive, the binder detail presents real nice. I also liked that I could put vertical photos in, many photo albums do not offer this. I filled this with photos and gave as a Christmas gift. My Father loved it and was impressed with the photo album also. I would definitely buy this album again and from this seller. It came in good packaging and arrived early! A truly good buy!
customer_reviews.author: nicbytheocean

customer_reviews.title: Great item, would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. It has a classic look and looks great displayed on my bookshelf.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin J. Hoff

customer_reviews.title: Great, Old Fashioned Photo Album
customer_reviews.text: Good looking photo books. Pockets large enough to easily slip in a 4x6 photo. Adequate area to write date and short notations for photos. On the negative side, the plastic pockets are thin and could rip if you were not careful.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Mauro

customer_reviews.title: Odor
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice. The chemical odor was unbelievable. I had to air it out for days. I’m still not ready to work in it.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Extremely poor quality, horrible odor, thin photo sleeves tear when inserting photos
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a Pioneer memory photo book several years ago and it was wonderful, which is why I ordered another one. The change in quality is shocking. I hope I'll be able to return it after opening it; the odor is so bad that we're experiencing headaches and I had to move it to the garage. Costco has a similar style (two pack) of much better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Yan Sun

customer_reviews.title: Good but strong glue odor when first opened. Let it off-gas and it’s good.
customer_reviews.text: Good but boy does it smell. It has a very strong glue/chemical odor. Once it’s opened and off-gasses you are good to go but it is quite strong when you open it.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Great way to organize photos.
customer_reviews.text: We've purhased these albums for several years now. Nice way to organize photos. Thanks...
customer_reviews.author: Suzievt

customer_reviews.title: Picture Perfect !
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this style of photo albums for years. They are the best! Pictures go in easily, ample room to add notations & comments. They are well made, have held up , & are neatly stored.
customer_reviews.author: GlitzyGiGi

customer_reviews.title: Great albums
customer_reviews.text: Hust as described; had bought some like these at Costco years back and was looking for similar ones found them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Starla Hedrick

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, really happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, really happy with it. Its nice and heavy. It has room for 3 horizontal photos on each page and has a small inside margin thats about an inch or so wide so that you can write a note beside the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Draven

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had 600 wedding photos and couldn't find a decently price book for 600 photos. I bought this not expecting much, but it is exactly as described. I couldn't be more please.
customer_reviews.author: AliciaTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Well made, and it looks good on our coffee table.
customer_reviews.text: Product is just as discribed. Very study, and easy to insert pictures into the pages. Used for pictures from a recent cruise.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good book, but strong smell
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice book that seems high quality and does what it says it well, but there is a strong smell (not offensive) that I'm hoping will fade with time.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Good, Old-Fashioned Phot Album
customer_reviews.text: Love the size - it’s taller than I was expecting, but that’s perfect! It has space next to each photo to write names, dates, etc. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nikita N.

customer_reviews.title: Photo Album
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased when I received the album. It was well made, easy to use, and fitted lots of photos. It would make a nice gift, too.
customer_reviews.author: Lili

customer_reviews.title: Really nice albums
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful albums. Big, nice leather covering, spacious and space to write next to each pic. Love it and will be ordering more
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J

customer_reviews.title: Photo Album As Pictured
customer_reviews.text: The photo album works great and holds a lot of photos. It is as it as it is described. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Luek

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love these albums! They are the only ones I buy. Much better quality than those found in stores. Very durable!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Big and bulky
customer_reviews.text: Large and nice leather, but the photos often jostle and fall out. Nice for a coffee table or centerpiece but ultimately huge
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: The albums look great and are put together well. However it can to take a little extra work to get the photos in the sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Bolton

customer_reviews.title: SMELLS HORRID
customer_reviews.text: This product smells like Sharpe. It has a waxy feel and it is a very uncomfortable size. I tried to air it out but it continued to stink up the whole room. I couldn't even hold it normally without it falling out of my hands because it was so waxy on the cover. You could smell it through the box that's how bad it smelled.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Rodriguez

product_meta.title: Pioneer Photo Albums CLB-346/BN Sewn Bonded Leather Bi-Directional 300 Photos Pocket Album (Brown)
product_meta.description: Color:BrownThis sewn European bonded leather photo album features a deluxe raised rounded book style spine. It holds 300 photos up to 4"x6" in optically clear pockets with a shaded background and a memo writing area. Photos are displayed three per page. Album measures 14.125"x9.25"x2". Photo safe: Acid, lignin and PVC free.
feature_bullets: Photo Safe: Acid, lignin and PVC free
